title: Last Light

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Last.Light-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-last.light.iso (1,824,751,616 bytes)
  • Alternative Goldberg crack is available in NoDVD folder after installation in case the game will start crashing for you; thanks to loladass!
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 1.7 to 1 GB)
  • Installation takes 1-2 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 1.7 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

It all takes place in a dark, ABANDONed hospital.
The hospital is enclosed in darkness.
All you have to light your way, is a flashlight, and the dim glow of candles…

Who awaits Lumi in the darkness?
Those who conceal themselves in the dark…
Those who sense your presence by catching the faintest of sounds…

Being ambushed by a demon completely out of the blue, or out of the dark, rather?
That is the kind of experience this game will deliver.

Utilize items to WARD off demons!
If a demon finds you, don’t hesitate to run.
Having the courage to flee may be your most important tactic.
The key points to this game are the hospital’s geography, lockers, and items.

Items that can be found in the field include those for improving visibility,
and for directly opposing the demons.
Make sure to put them to good use!

GRASPing the past, may only lead to deepening the abyss.
Diaries, serving as clues to what happened in the tragedy-stricken past,
can be found throughout the hospital.

A characteristic of this game is that the difficulty gradually rises as the story progresses.
Even for those who feel the game lacks a bit in challenge,
there will be an utterly despairing ending waiting for you.
